title: FS: Hindu, Tolstoi and AB backs

posts.post_title: FS: Hindu, Tolstoi and AB backs
posts.post_content:
For sale is a :

Hindu back Bill Bergen SGC 20.  Really nice for the grade, no paper loss, clean back.  Some surface wrinkling and rounding corners.  Asking SOLD

Tolstoi back Snodgrass SGC 50.  BEAUTIFUL card.  No creases no paper loss really clean back and strong corners.  Asking SOLD

American Beauty back Malarkey SGC 35. Great colors nice back.  Some corner creases but over all very nice looking card. Asking SOLD

Paypal f/f.  $2 to ship.  Thanks!
